title: Dose response - increase dose - decrease response

content.prompt: Toxicologists say, “the dose makes the poison,” meaning that most substances are harmful in high enough concentrations. The data for anastrozole

choices.label: supports this concept because as concentration increases, so does response
supports this concept because as concentration increases, response decreases
does not support this concept because as concentration increases, response increases
does not support this concept because as concentration increases, response decreases
does not support this concept because the experiment was not done in animals

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Interpret experimental data and results in relation to a given hypothesis.
